column5: Hey there, my name is Kyle I live in Burlington and I was wondering if any one knows a good fishing area around here
I can not help you  but welcome aboard what kind of fish do you like to fish for, from a boat or are you looking for shore fishing
like to fish for mostly bass but when pike in season I like that to. And I prefer fishing from a conoe rather then the shore, u can get rite to the fish quitely

Binbrook conservation area, if you don't mind a little drive up the red hill.  Welcome to the board, you will find everyone here very friendly, tell us a bit about yourself and read read read... there is so much information to be had here and certainly do not hesitate to share...
thanks Jen, and I dont really mind a drive but unfortunately I dont drive I was tryin to find a close stream or river  I think I mite take a look on Google maps lol
